sql_text: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_sandbox.lobsters_hottest (short_id VARCHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY, created_at DATETIME, title TEXT, url TEXT, score INT, flags INT, comment_count INT, submitter_user VARCHAR(255), user_is_author BOOLEAN, tags_json JSON);

INSERT INTO agent_sandbox.lobsters_hottest (short_id, created_at, title, url, score, flags, comment_count, submitter_user, user_is_author, tags_json) VALUES ('qmjejh','2026-02-15 08:36:09','AI is slowly munching away my passion','https://whynot.fail/human/ai-is-slowly-munching-away-my-passion/',43,2,32,'dzervas',TRUE,CAST('["programming","vibecoding"]' AS JSON)),('dvwczg','2026-02-15 14:58:04','Is End-to-End Encryption Optional For Large Groups?','https://soatok.blog/2026/02/14/is-end-to-end-encryption-optional-for-large-groups/',36,1,5,'fanf',FALSE,CAST('["cryptography","security"]' AS JSON)),('uvdj0c','2026-02-15 08:07:05','A Single Reason To Not Vibe Code','https://asindu.xyz/a-single-reason-to-not-vibe-code',23,10,29,'asindu',TRUE,CAST('["vibecoding"]' AS JSON)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE created_at=VALUES(created_at), title=VALUES(title), url=VALUES(url), score=VALUES(score), flags=VALUES(flags), comment_count=VALUES(comment_count), submitter_user=VALUES(submitter_user), user_is_author=VALUES(user_is_author), tags_json=VALUES(tags_json);

SELECT tag, COUNT(*) AS story_count, SUM(score) AS total_score, SUM(comment_count) AS total_comments FROM (SELECT score, comment_count, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(tags_json, '$[0]')) AS tag FROM agent_sandbox.lobsters_hottest WHERE JSON_LENGTH(tags_json) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT score, comment_count, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(tags_json, '$[1]')) AS tag FROM agent_sandbox.lobsters_hottest WHERE JSON_LENGTH(tags_json) > 1 UNION ALL SELECT score, comment_count, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(tags_json, '$[2]')) AS tag FROM agent_sandbox.lobsters_hottest WHERE JSON_LENGTH(tags_json) > 2) AS exploded_tags GROUP BY tag ORDER BY story_count DESC, total_score DESC, total_comments DESC
